example.name: ARG2 is sometimes redundant in AMRs when cryotherapy co-occurs with particular non-LVs
example.text: Precancerous cervical lesion treated with cryotherapy , September 2018 .
example.amr: (t / treat-03 :ARG2 (s / sign-symptom :name (n / name :op1 "lesion") :location (a / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "cervix")) :ARG1-of (p / precancerous-01)) :ARG3 (c / cryotherapy-01 :ARG2 s) :time (d / date-entity :month 9 :year 2018))

example.name: ...but this is evidence for including ARG2
example.text: Three days earlier he had received cryotherapy for an eruption of warts on his right hand .
example.amr: (c / cryotherapy-01 :ARG1 (h / he) :ARG2 (e / erupt-01 :ARG1 (s / sign-symptom :pl + :name (n / name :op1 "wart")) :location (a / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "right" :op2 "hand") :part-of h)) :time (b / before :quant (t / temporal-quantity :quant 3 :unit (d / day))))
